description: How did a giant steel-and-concrete building (WTC 7) fall in on itself in perfect, controlled-demolition fashion, when it was not hit by any plane? Why did eyewitnesses affirm that were there bombs in the buildings? Why did Larry Silverstein say “pull it!”? What caused the solid steel frames to turn to dust? Why did the Bushes trade and meet with the Bin Ladens? Why was a drill conducted on 9/11, at the exact same time, at the exact same place, for the exact same scenario? Why would someone have terrorist insurance?
